item.description:
Come join me for the 9th Annual Rock n' Rib Fest for great food and entertainment on the beautiful and spacious grounds of Anheuser-Busch. This family-oriented event will feature nationally renowned professional ribbers and local award-winning restaurants providing mouth-watering ribs for everyone to enjoy. Add great entertainment for and you have a recipe for fun and excitement. As the official New Hampshire State Barbecue Championships, you will experience some of the best grillers and BBQers in the northeast vying for title of New Hampshire Barbecue Grand Champion. What I found out last year is if we get there early , we can get parking right across the street from the brewery.We will meet at the entrance.

http://www.rotaryribfest.org

Music :

http://www.rotaryribfest.org/music/

Activities:

http://www.rotaryribfest.org/activities/

[b]2011 Ribbers:[/b]

http://www.rotaryribfest.org/activities/rib-vendors/

[b]If You Don’t Feel Like Ribs[/b]

http://www.rotaryribfest.org/activities/food-beverages/

[b]Cost:[/b]

$7; Children under 9 are free

[b]Carpool location:[/b]

If you want to carpool (not recommended) please indicate in your RSVP. The carpool location is at the tennis court at the corner of Westgate Crossing and Candlewood Park Nashua at 11:30 AM. To get to Westgate Crossing, start at Route 3 and take exit 5W. Keep on Route 111. Go for about 1.5 miles. Westgate Crossing is on the left right after a nursing home. The carpool location is then the first turn on the right.
item.why: We've done this event the last 4 years. Lots of good food, company and entertainment.
item.name: Rock'N Rib Fest, Anheuser-Busch
